mapper.insert: insert into follow (followNum, userNum, followDate) values (#{followNum}, #{userNum}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from follow where followNum=#{followNum} and userNum=#{userNum}
mapper.select: select * from user_role UR inner join user U on UR.userNum=U.userNum left join follow F on U.userNum=F.userNum where UR.rolenum=2
